word:
"We were just in time [for the fourth of July celebration and] 
     to witness the procession of the birds of paradise. The leader was 
     represented as an Indian warrior, then followed the Continentals, 
     the signers of the Declaration of Independence dressed as they 
     dressed, powdered hair, short breeches and leggings. Some things 
     were really interesting and some ridiculous.--Letter 33, 1876 


                                    -287-
